meaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> who pilots a <radical>helicopter</radical> will have the insatiable <kanji>need</kanji> for something. She doesn't know what it is. But she needs it. And that's why she's flying around looking for it!
readingMnemonic: Finally she knows what she <kanji>need</kanji>s! It's <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう)! Delicious, creamy yogurt!
